channel.title: AdminCP (Control Panel) on vB5 Manual and API Documentation

item.title: Navigating the AdminCP
item.description: Logging into the AdminCP The vBulletin Admin Control Panel can be accessed by pointing your browser at http://www.example.com/forums/admincp/. The first thing you will see when you access the Control Panel is a prompt to log in. You may be presented with this login prompt even if you are already logged into the frontend of your vBulletin site. To log in, simply enter the username and password of a user account with administrator privileges, such as the one you created towards the end of the installation script process.
